name: 246-32 leknes hat
notes:
knitted hat for men in drops merino extra fine or drops fiesta. pattern me-273; yarn group b

**sizes**: m - l/xl
fits head-size: 56/58 - 58/60 cm
length: 23-24 cm (with fold-up)

**yarn**:
drops merino extra fine from garnstudio
100-100 g colour 47, sage green

or use:
drops fiesta from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group b)
100-100 g colour 07, sea green

**needles**:
drops circular needle size 3,5 mm: length 40 cm.
drops circular needle size 3 mm: length 40 cm.
drops double pointed needles size 3,5 mm.
the technique magic loop can be used â€“ you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size.

**knitting tension**:
22 stitches in width and 30 rows in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm.
